group1-desc: The Ultimate Decentralized Social Platform Centered in NFT
group1-foot-title: The First Web3 Social Platform for Everyone with no Barriers.
metaso-desc:
Show3 is the first node of MetaSo, an open-source, social networking, Web3 middleware based on MetaID protocol.  
 MetaSo aims to create an ultimate decentralized social network based on blockchain technology where every piece of data truly belongs to users.  
 In MetaSo, the social data generated by every user can be reused and Interoperable. Anyone can run a MetaSo node with ease and without permission.
metaso-content: The Ultimate Decentralized Social Network with Show Platform as the First Node.

Home.page-two-title-drsc: Accumulate Social Interaction On-chain and Enjoy NFT Free Mint!
Home.Personalized NFT Drsc: Personalized NFT expresses your personality and social status. Sometimes a personalized NFTs can give you special social features that other users don’t have.
Home.Avatar NFTs Drsc: Avatar NFTs is your virtual image in the world of Web3.  Cultivate, Play, and Earn with your avatars!
Home.Equipment NFTs Drsc: It contains 4 special kinds of NFT used to decorate your Avatar, including Background, Costumes, Pet and Treasure. They provide different Attribute Bonuses to your Avatar and makes it extraordinary.
Home.Utility NFTs Drsc: Unlock advanced features by holding Utility NFTs! More categories like Domain Name NFT and DAO Pass are coming!
Home.Web3 Clubs DAOs Drsc: Discover & Join Your Favorite Web3 Communities
Home.All Chains One Platform Drsc: Support multiple blockchains at the same time.

ME.intro1: ME is the full name of MetaEnergy, which is the point system in Show3. ME is the full name of MetaEnerge, which is the point system in Show3. ME is not a cryptocurrency in the general sense. It cannot be sold and is not planned to be listed on any exchange, nor will it support any cross-platform use. It is only used for circulation and payment for some services within Show3. The Show team will not keep ME, nor sell any ME, nor encourage users to hoard ME. All new accounts during Show test phase will receive 10000 ME.
ME.intro2: Supply: Unlimited, generated by user behavior.
ME.intro3:
The main way to obtain ME is to exchange experience points for The specific formula is:  
 ME Gaining = EXP * (1+ ) . . .  
 In short, the number of MEs obtained by users is related to the following factors:
ME.intro4: EXPs earned through socializing and interacting
ME.intro6: The total holding time of all NFTs of the user
ME.intro8: The following scenarios will consume ME and burn ME, and the Show team will not hold any ME.
ME.intro9: Pay the daily data on-chain GAS fee
ME.intro10: GAS fee for users to participate in Social & Mint
ME.intro11: Upgrade related NFTs, such as Avatar, MetaPet, etc.

MetaName.RegisteringTips: It will take about 3 minutes, please wait patiently. You can check the registered MetaName on the "My" page.
MetaName.IndexTitle1: Web3 Naming Brings You Real Social Value
MetaName.IndexDrsc1: MetaName is a Decentralized, Open-sourced and Cross-chain Name System Based on MetaID Protocol
MetaName.IndexTitle2: Say Hi to Frens from ALL Blockchains
MetaName.IndexDrsc2: You can socialize with the entire Web3 population from all blockchains with a MetaName, no matter what blockchain you use.
MetaName.IndexDrsc3: You can build a Web3 Club with MetaNames to manage your community and EARN through Airdrop, NFT Sales and Commissions.
MetaName.IndexTitle4: Own a Most Powerful Decentralized Social Website
MetaName.IndexDrsc4: A metaid.io decentralized website can show your All-blockchain's reputation, opinions, incarnations, music & videos, and assets (ofc, with ur consent) to the world. Your friends can also send end-to-end encrypted messages to you via this webpage.
MetaName.IndexDrsc5: MetaName Is the First Name System on MetaID. Almost All MetaID & MetaSo Apps Support MetaName.
MetaName.IndexDrsc6: MetaName Makes Your Address & Applications One of A Kind
MetaName.error8: The payment was sent successfully and failed, trying to send again
MetaName.error9: If the payment is successful, resending fails twice and ends
MetaName.Expire date Tips: The expiration time is an estimation. The exact time is based on the block height of the blockchain.
MetaName.RenewingTips:
It will take about 3 minutes, please be patient. 
You can check the renewal status of this domain name on the "My" page later.
MetaName.Issueing: MetaName is casting normally, please try again later
MetaName.IndexIntro2: No More Social Barriers and Data Silos!
MetaName.IndexIntro4: A holistic you in Web3, in ONE data container.
MetaName.IndexTitle7: The Multifunctional Web3 Name Defined By You
MetaName.IndexDrsc7: 1 MetaName = Multiple Crypto Wallets Address + a Web3 Twitter Account + Discord's Username + A Strong Web3 Club + A Name of A DAO + ...
MetaName.RegisterNamesTips: Names of English Alphabet & Numerical Digit are Open

allowUpdate:
It is detected that your account needs to be upgraded, canceling the upgrade may affect other subsequent wallet logins, please confirm! 
 (Special reminder: 1. If your previously registered account is registered and bound through 'WalletConnect', please use 'WalletConnect' to upgrade 
;2. If your account is registered and bound through the web client 'MetaMask', please use the web client 'MetaMask' wallet to perform the upgrade operation, otherwise the account upgrade will fail)
